20.eng-name: The Book on Vows and Oaths
20.ara-name: كتاب النذور والأيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Salim bin 'Abdullah:From this father (Ibn Umar) who said: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) often would swear with this oath: 'No! By the Changer of the Hearts

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ كَيْفَ كَانَ يَمِينُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About How The Prophet (ﷺ) Would Swear
